query: WITH entities AS (SELECT status, approval_process_id, id FROM credit_facilities WHERE ((status = ANY($1)) AND (COALESCE((approval_process_id, id) < ($4, $3), $3 IS NULL))) ORDER BY approval_process_id DESC, id DESC LIMIT $2) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: CreditFacilityId", e.sequence, e.event, e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN credit_facility_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY i.approval_process_id desc, i.id desc, i.id, e.sequence
